headline: Is Uber Technologies, Inc. (UBER) the Least Risky Internet Stock to Invest In?
summary: We recently published a list of Analysts Identify 10 Least Risky Internet Stocks To Invest In. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Uber Technologies, Inc. (NYSE:UBER) stands against other least risky internet stocks to invest in. Investors usually do not waste any time reminding everyone of the dot-com bubble […]

headline: Uber Technologies (NYSE:UBER) In Talks To Acquire Trendyol Go In Turkey
summary: Rumors of Uber Technologies (NYSE:UBER) potentially acquiring Turkish food delivery platform Trendyol Go may have influenced its shares, which rose 12% last quarter. This speculation coincided with positive earnings announcements revealing robust year-over-year growth in sales and net income. Additionally, the company's partnerships, such as with DoorDash in Canada and Petco in the U.S., emphasized its expanding delivery network. A considerable share buyback program also likely supported the...

headline: Bill Ackman Makes Big Bet on Hertz Becoming Tariff Winner
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Bill Ackman’s Pershing Square Capital Management has amassed a nearly 20% stake in Hertz Global Holdings Inc. in a bet on the rental car company’s turnaround plan and that tariffs will boost the value of its vehicles.Most Read from BloombergTrump Signs Executive Orders on Federal Purchasing, Office SpaceDOGE Places Entire Staff of Federal Homelessness Agency on LeaveTrump Administration Takes Over New York Penn Station RevampHow Did This Suburb Figure Out Mass Transit?Why the Best
